attributes.additional_details: It is really stressful and you get punished for it
attributes.background: Make homework illeagal please it is really stressful

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Abolish all homework:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643846

Ban homework except for GCSE coursework:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637387

Ban primary schools from setting homework:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636943
